title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content:
e the Grand Duke. After this event, speak to Mizora in the city and she will tell you that the Duke has been relocated. After this Interaction, take a rest at the camp when you are ready to trigger the next sequence.

You will be visited by Mizora at some point at Camp after a long rest. She will offer Wyll a deal.

Here, you will meet the sisters of Justice. Wyll wants to find and save his father so Mizora gives him two choices. She offers another bargain. Your two options are the following:

I
